pageContext.claim: “Everybody was making a lot of money. Everybody was doing good and it was coming together. And then, China sent us this horrible bad present, a real bad present.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump paints a picture of pre-pandemic life that is rosier than accurate. Household incomes had started to grow but it was not equal for everyone. The top five percent of earners increased their family income far faster than other groups.
